alert.note: Alert for Deltana and Tanana Flats; Denali; Eastern Alaska Range; Middle Tanana Valley; Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 2:57PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...High Water Levels On Most Rivers Into This Weekend... Ice is now gone from most rivers across the Southeast Interior, but many rivers and streams will run high from the snowmelt. This is causing gravel bars to be covered with water and many logs to be in the rivers. A significant rain event from Friday into the weekend will likely cause a jump in river and streams across the Southeast Interior this weekend. People along Southeast Interior rivers and streams should prepare for high water levels through this weekend. River access points and gravel bars will likely be covered with water along with increased debris in rivers. The latest breakup information is available at www.weather.gov/aprfc/breakupMap.

area.areaDesc: Deltana and Tanana Flats; Denali; Eastern Alaska Range; Middle Tanana Valley; Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country
